snippet: The Diocese of Gallup plans to petition for Chapter 11 reorganization in federal bankruptcy court because of mounting legal claims over sexual abuse by clergy members.
abstract: Roman Catholic Diocese of Gallup, NM, plans to petition for Chapter 11 reorganization in federal bankruptcy court in face of mounting legal claims over sexual abuse by clergy members.
lead_paragraph: The Diocese of Gallup plans to petition for Chapter 11 reorganization in federal bankruptcy court because of mounting legal claims over sexual abuse by clergy members.

headline.main: New Mexico: Gallup Diocese Will File for Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Gallup Diocese Will File For Bankruptcy
